document_data.name: Sunrise Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sunrise Inn''' was a small and quiet inn that stood in the south-eastern edge of the city of [[Phlan]] in the [[Moonsea]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1350}}, the inn did business in rebuilt Phlan after the defeat of [[Tyranthraxus]] a decade earlier. A single sign that hung over the inn's door proclaimed the establishment's name welcoming its guests.. The innkeep of ''Sunrise Inn'' offered free lodgings to respected individuals, such as the Heroes of Phlan.
